    • removeContact

      public boolean removeContact​(Contact c)
      Description copied from interface: KademliaBucket
      Remove a contact from this bucket. If there are replacement contacts in the replacement cache, select the last seen one and put it into the bucket while removing the required contact. If there are no contacts in the replacement cache, then we just mark the contact requested to be removed as stale. Marking as stale would actually be incrementing the stale count of the contact.
      Specified by:
      removeContact in interface KademliaBucket
      Parameters:
      c - The contact to remove
      Returns:
      Boolean whether the removal was successful.

    • removeNode
